This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS PointerEvent: Verifies that chorded buttons fire appropriate events 
PASS LM button sequence A 
PASS LM button sequence B 
PASS LM button sequence C 
PASS LMR button sequence 
PASS Move with & without button 
PASS Off-the-page button changes 
PASS LM button with preventDefault on pointerdown 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
